comment.author: 15937237@N00
comment._content: Remarkably this view hasn't changed too much in a century - north end of Union Square where the Greenmarket is now held.

comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: Can't identify if this is the Orphans, and another sad story is the Orphan Trains.    Sad times back then and it continues on today.    Many Children suffer from lack of a good Mother.   The Father goes off into the Wild Blue Yonder.    That is bad enough, but when the Mother don't give a rats ***, then the Poor Little Children have a double Whammy.    It takes a loving , hard working Mother to keep the Children together.
